summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a search of Western Union records conducted under a subpoena from the US District Court for the Southern District of New York. It involves communication between FBI agents and an investigator from Western Union's Financial Intelligence Unit.

persons.name: Mark M. Lubin
persons.context: Mark M. Lubin is mentioned as an FBI agent involved in the correspondence regarding the Western Union records search.

persons.name: Amanda N. Young
persons.context: Amanda N. Young is mentioned as an FBI agent who is part of the communication regarding the Western Union records.

persons.name: Michael L. Foster
persons.context: Michael L. Foster is identified as an investigator from Western Union's Financial Intelligence Unit, who conducted the search of the records.

connections.description: Both are FBI agents working together on the investigation related to the Western Union records.
Mark M. Lubin and Michael L. Foster are collaborating on the investigation involving Western Union records.
Amanda N. Young and Michael L. Foster are both involved in the investigation regarding the Western Union records.

keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence dated September 4, 2019.
It discusses a search of Western Union records conducted under a subpoena from the US District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The email is sent by Michael L. Foster, an investigator from Western Union's Financial Intelligence Unit.
